95: The Ideas That Birthed the Reformation

Martin LutherChris Hutchinson ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ ğŸ•Šï¸

I'm having fun with ChatGPT. What if Mr. Bean had nailed the 95 thesis? Would Martin Luther have liked Mr. Rogers? What if the Letter to Garcia never arrived? What if The Jilting of Granny Weatherall was written as a modern TV sitcom? What's the difference between a dog?

Paperback , 2017

$ 18.99$ 9.49 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Givenness of Things: Essays

Marilynne RobinsonChris Hutchinson ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ ğŸ•Šï¸

Wow! Look at this book my friend (and one of our church's elders) just published. It examines Creation as artistic wrestling through the works of: ~ Czeslaw Milosz (poetry) ~ Terrence Malick (films) ~ Marilynne Robinson (novels) ~ Annie Dillard (essays) https://t.co/VelQ4luWe0

Hardcover , 2015

$ 26.00$ 13.00 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

A prayer for Tuesday: Father, grant us the wisdom and understanding, not in a multitude of words, but of good lives, shown in the works done in the meekness of wisdom. ~ from James 3:13

John in the Company of Poets: The Gospel in Literary Imagination

Thomas GardnerChris Hutchinson ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ ğŸ•Šï¸

It's an academic work, so pricey as these things tend to be, but I suspect it may interest some of you. It looks amazing. FWIW, one of Tom's other books was "John in the Company of Poets: The Gospel in Literary Imagination." A fantastic book: https://t.co/37gFKEmsuv

Paperback , 2014

$ 74.99$ 49.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book(max discount $ 25 )

@Rad_Sherwoodism @PLeithart @jessenigro We need to put him and George in the same party deep in some dungeon along with guys like James White and John MacArthur and see if they can make it out by working together. @JosiahHawthorne, help us out?

@CrankyFed Interesting thought. I remember seeing a Christian homeschool catalog w/ "Bible Lessons from John Quincy Adams" and I was like, wasn't he Unitarian? Put out by Doug Philips, so maybe his project was about culture (& $), not orthodoxy: cc: @kkdumez https://t.co/Zj5TRFwXZU
